text: Hylodes amnicola is a frog. It lives in Minas Gerais in Brazil. People have seen it 1400 meters above sea level. The adult male frog is 25.3-28.1 mm long from nose to rear end. The skin of the frog's back can be brown or gray in color, with stripes and marks. The skin of the frog's belly is white in color. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Hylodes amnicola
